galleryDescriptionOne: Our fashionable 500ml bottles do not only look pretty but are made of high quality materials. This means that you can carry your bottle anywhere you go without worrying that it'll break.
galleryDescriptionTwo: The Jugsie insulation technology ensures that drinks stay cool for at least 24 hours and cold for at least 12 hours. Our summer tip is to put 2 ice cubes in your drink before closing the bottle to ensure that your drink stays cold for the entire day in extremely high temperatures.
sustainabilitySecondTextHome: and never buy a plastic bottle again.
